local_intent: Detect and align to the milk_box, open gripper, push it 0.15 m at 0 deg, verify it is not grasped, then pause and retreat.
assumptions: Push path across the table is clear
Milk box remains visible for detection
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence and parameters for detect-align-open-push-wait-retreat; adds retry on detection and a non-grasp verification via inverted ObjectInGripper.
